com.ziluck.factions.base

Interface UserStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoadUserStore, MongoUserStore, NitriteUserStore

    public interface UserStore
    The base system to store and load Users.
    Author:
    Michael Ziluck

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        static UserStore getInstance()
        Returns:
        the singleton instance stored in the Factions main class.

      • getOnlineUsers

        Collection<User> getOnlineUsers()
        Returns:
        all online users.

      • getUser

        User getUser(UUID uuid)
        Gets an online User based on the given UUID.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the uuid to look for.
        Returns:
        the User if one is found.

      • getUser

        User getUser(String name)
        Gets an online User based on their name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the User.
        Returns:
        the User if one is found.

      • getUser

        User getUser(long id)
        Gets an online User based on their internal id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the User.
        Returns:
        the User if one is found.

      • getUser

        User getUser(CommandSender sender)
        Gets an online User based on the Bukkit CommandSender.
        Parameters:
        sender - the Bukkit CommandSender.
        Returns:
        the User if one is found.

      • getUser

        User getUser(UUID uuid,
             boolean includeOffline)
        Gets a User based on their uuid. If includeOffline is set to true, it will also retrieve offline Users.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the uuid of the User.
        includeOffline - whether to include offline Users or not.
        Returns:
        the User if they have ever connected.

      • getUser

        User getUser(String name,
             boolean includeOffline)
        Gets a User based on their name. If includeOffline is set to true, it will also retrieve offline Users.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the User.
        includeOffline - whether to include offline Users or not.
        Returns:
        the User if they have ever connected.

      • getUser

        User getUser(long id,
             boolean includeOffline)
        Gets a User based on their internal id. If includeOffline is set to true, it will also retrieve offline Users.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the User.
        includeOffline - whether to include offline Users or not.
        Returns:
        the User if they have ever connected.

      • getUser

        User getUser(CommandSender sender,
             boolean includeOffline)
        Gets an online User based on the Bukkit CommandSender. If inlucdeOffline is sset to true, it will also retrieve offline Users.
        Parameters:
        sender - the Bukkit CommandSender.
        includeOffline - whether to include offline Users or not.
        Returns:
        the User if one is found.

      • getConsole

        User getConsole()
        Returns the User wrapper for the console.
        Returns:
        the User wrapper for the console.

      • loadUser

        User loadUser(Player player)
        Load the User for the given Player. If it is a new Player, it will also create a new User.
        Parameters:
        player - the payer to load.
        Returns:
        the loaded User.

      • loadUser

        User loadUser(long id)
        Load the User that has the given id. If a user is not found, this will throw an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the User to load.
        Returns:
        the loaded User.

      • createUser

        User createUser(Player player)
        Creates a new User for the given Player.

        Important to know that this method does not check if the Player already has a User so use with caution.

        Parameters:
        player - the player for whom to create a User.
        Returns:
        the newly created User.

      • save

        void save(User user)
        Saves the given User to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the User to save.

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initialize UserStores with whatever they need to do when they are constructed.
